content: The default bulk data scope list does not include system/Patient.read. Is this by design and/or based on the specification?

The default bulk data scope list does not include system/Patient.read.

The default scope shown in the UI is system/*.read
image.png

Yunwei Wang said:

The default bulk data scope list does not include system/Patient.read.

The default scope shown in the UI is system/*.read
image.png

Interesting - I'm seeing this list :
image.png
is there some registration step that needs to be done?
@Yunwei Wang It looks like system/*.read is what we have in our preset, but the above is the default when not using the preset.

This is really strange. I could not find any document why we skipped that scope. We had an invalid system/system.read between system/Organization.read and system/Practitioner.read in a very early version. Then we removed it because it was not a valid scope. Now I think may be it was meant to be system/Patient.read but mis-typed. I think the scope should include system/Patient.read
Thanks for confirming our suspicions - this is causing us to fail many of the tests for Multi-Patient. Should I create a Github issue?
